publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1363 David McLetchie: Sale of Alcohol at Murrayfield Stadium-That the Parliament notes that the sale of alcohol within Murrayfield Stadium, Edinburgh was licensed on the occasion of the BT Cup Finals on 1 May 2004 and the Scotland versus Barbarians match on 22 May 2004 and that both events were well conducted and gave rise to no problems of crowd disorder; believes that international rugby union matches played at Murrayfield Stadium should cease to be designated sporting events for the purposes of the Criminal Law (Consolidation) (Scotland) Act 1995, and calls on the Scottish Executive to bring forward amending legislation to that effect. Supported by: Mike Pringle*, Tricia Marwick*, David Mundell*, Murdo Fraser*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Bill Aitken*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Margaret Mitchell*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*

S2M-1363# David McLetchie: Sale of Alcohol at Murrayfield Stadium-That the Parliament notes that the sale of alcohol within Murrayfield Stadium, Edinburgh was licensed on the occasion of the BT Cup Finals on 1 May 2004 and the Scotland versus Barbarians match on 22 May 2004 and that both events were well conducted and gave rise to no problems of crowd disorder; believes that international rugby union matches played at Murrayfield Stadium should cease to be designated sporting events for the purposes of the Criminal Law (Consolidation) (Scotland) Act 1995, and *considers that* the Scottish Executive *should* bring forward amending legislation to that effect. Supported by: Mike Pringle, Tricia Marwick, David Mundell, Murdo Fraser, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Bill Aitken, Mr Brian Monteith, Margaret Mitchell, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Phil Gallie*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Mary Scanlon*, Mrs Nanette Milne*
S2M-1363# Sale of Alcohol at Murrayfield Stadium (lodged on 26 May 2004) John Scott*, Donald Gorrie*, Mr David Davidson*, Fergus Ewing*
S2M-1363# Sale of Alcohol at Murrayfield Stadium (lodged on 26 May 2004) Mr Ted Brocklebank*
S2M-1363# Sale of Alcohol at Murrayfield Stadium (lodged on 26 May 2004) Miss Annabel Goldie*
S2M-1363# Sale of Alcohol at Murrayfield Stadium (lodged on 26 May 2004) Murray Tosh*
